title: Washington may drift from Europe, but not from Greece
summary_full: Greece is a serious EU actor but doesn't outsource its relationship with Washington to Brussels. Athens has unusual leverage as a key logistics hub, a voice in Eastern Mediterranean diplomacy, and a bridge for US engagement with partners across the region
summary_public: Greece is a serious EU actor but doesn't outsource its relationship with Washington to Brussels. Athens has unusual leverage as a key logistics hub, a voice in Eastern Mediterranean diplomacy, and a bridge for US engagem…

GR.label: positive
GR.evidence: Greece is a serious EU actor
